long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save ads from TikTok and Facebook Ad Library with one click. Organize them into boards, and quickly gather interesting video material and re-creation.

We built Topview Video Downloader - Save TikTok & Facebook Ad to build a collection of inspiring videos for your next ad campaign.

Key Features:
• Save ads from TikTok
• Save ads from TikTok Creative Center
• Save ads from Facebook AdLibrary
• Organize ad inspiration into boards
• No Expired Links: Saved ads get stored in the cloud and you have access forever.
• Share Links: Create a link to share a board with anyone
• Automatic Analysis of Video Scripts
• Discovery Library with +500k curated ads

Additional Features:
Go to topview.ai
• Transform any footage into high-performing videos, increasing views, engagement, and conversions.
• AI Script Generator
• Auto Caption
